notes.text:
This update for webkit2gtk3 fixes the following issues:

Update to version 2.46.0 (bsc#1231039).

- CVE-2024-40866
- CVE-2024-44187

Already fixed in version 2.44.3:

- CVE-2024-4558
- CVE-2024-27838
- CVE-2024-27851

Already fixed in version 2.44.2:

- CVE-2024-27834
- CVE-2024-27808
- CVE-2024-27820
- CVE-2024-27833

Already fixed in version 2.44.1:

- CVE-2024-23222
- CVE-2024-23206
- CVE-2024-23213
- CVE-2024-23271
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A cross-origin issue existed with "iframe" elements. This was addressed with improved tracking of security origins. This issue is fixed in Safari 18, visionOS 2, watchOS 11, macOS Sequoia 15, iOS 18 and iPadOS 18, tvOS 18. A malicious website may exfiltrate data cross-origin.
